thread.title: Is this the most environmentally friendly aircraft in the sky? | Meridian
thread.title_full: Is this the most environmentally friendly aircraft in the sky? | Meridian - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Is this the most environmentally friendly aircraft in the sky? | Meridian
text:
Play video It's claimed to be the most environmentally friendly plane ever - and has flown into Heathrow carrying passengers for the time.
Heathrow and Gatwick say planes like the A350 will lead to less noise for thousands under the flight paths in the Thames Valley and Sussex.
So what's so special about the new plane and what do our noise campaigners think? Our Transport Correspondent Milke Pearse was on its first trip.
Last updated Fri 16 Oct 2015 Technology
